main event: A sighting of a large, strange glow moving slowly through the sky was reported by a resident in Warrenville, Illinois, on 11 August 1963.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 to 30 seconds, moving in a southeasterly direction,The witness reported the object flashing three times before disappearing,Another person, the Bank Manager across the street, confirmed seeing the same phenomenon,The object was described as appearing solid and not resembling an airplane or satellite,The sky was clear with no moon at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a large, strange glow in the sky
witness description: a resident and the Bank Manager
